reviews.customers_say: Customers find the leotard fits well and looks sexy, with one mentioning it's perfect for carrying in a purse or pocket. They appreciate its soft material, true-to-size fit, and consider it good value for money, noting it offers great quality for the price. Customers like the comfort, with one mentioning it's not scratchy, and they like the color, with one describing it as a deep green.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty but not much to it:)
items.body: This item can actually fit in your purse or pocket .....and you will still have room leftover:) I usually wear a medium and it fit well. I will say that I did not realize that it did not cover your breasts so I was a little confused at first lol. However, I do have to say that it is very pretty. The color is mostly white with some small white bows as details. The center has a lace with roses within it, as the roses in the fabric part also match the lace in the middle part. There is also some ruffled lace attached with stretchy edging to give you more movement and stretch to the garment. The fabric is soft to the touch and is comfortable to wear. It also has an adjustable back with hooks (like a bra would have) so that is also a plus to this piece. Overall, this lingerie is well made, soft and comfortable to wear, and is adjustable to fit most/all body types. Just be aware that this does not have anything for your boobs to fit 'into' or have to hold them up. The point is to have your boobs free:) It is a very pretty though! Read more

items.author: It hurts horrible !! I feels like burns inside me! I’m afraid to use the second one! I hope I can sleep!

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it
items.body: Just buy it. I had this in my cart for a while not sure but after reading reviews decided to order it and surprise my husband. He LOVED it and is now is favorite lingerie I own. I have quite a few pieces from this brand and they are all nice. Only reason I knocked a start off was bc of the short torso like others had said too. I had the straps all the way and still felt short in the torso. I wear either large or xl for Amazon and I sized up to Xxl and fit good. I’m 5’4 and 175 lbs. and agree with others that you need a bigger chest to fill this out to look good. I got it for $10 and for the money I feel it was a good buy. Read more
items.author: mommy of 2 from WI

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Floral, Black*2, Geo Pattern, Square Pattern, Nude, Rose Red, Black Heart, Star, Black Batterfly, Leopard, Peony Print, Red Sequins, Black Sequins, Royal Blue#. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
